title: Random Errors When Closing Tab
author: cinquestl
body_snippet:
Closing panel with single connection throws error

## Expected Behavior
When closing the panel that contains a single connection will periodically toss an error window.

## Current Behavior
The tab and connection will close, but the error window will display as follows:
Error (1/24/2019 10:40:43 AM)
Couldn't add panel
Object reference notset to an instance of an object.

Clicking OK closes the dialog. mRemoteNG continues to run normally. No loss of connections in other tabs.
